nodes.text: Kerch Kushi was a male senator of the Separatist Parliament. Kushi supported the democracy and was opposed to Senator Voe Atell's opinions, stating that the corporations did not rule them. He voted in favor of opening peace negotiations with the Galactic Republic.

Kushi was voiced by Gideon Emery, who also voices fellow Separatist Lott Dod. Kushi's surname was misspelled twice as "Kusi" in the episode guide for "Heroes on Both Sides." His character model (face) is very similar to the Death Watch bomber in the episode "The Mandalore Plot."
